subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Football
Suits and Litigation
Sentences (Criminal)
Dogfighting
lead_paragraph: Michael Vick’s future  in the National Football League became more tenuous when two more of his co-defendants accepted plea agreements and implicated him in a dogfighting ring.
snippet: Michael Vick’s future  in the National Football League became more tenuous when two more of his co-defendants accepted plea agreements and implicated him in a dogfighting ring.
